altername_name: Zen-Nippon Joshi Pro Wrestling: Joou Densetsu Yume no Taikousen
name: Zen Nippon Joshi Pro Wrestling: Legendary Queen: Tournament of Dreams
overview: Zen-Nippon Joshi Pro Wrestling - Joou Densetsu Yume no Taikousen is a wrestling game featuring male & female characters, and only 2 game modes are fighting exhibition matches or fighting for the title. The main game mode is the WWWA Ranking Match, sort of a Career Mode that features 13 characters to choose from
